items.content_html: A lightweight, responsive web app mimicking the iPhone's native calculator. Built with React, it offers a sleek UI and essential functionalities for basic calculations. Ideal for learning React basics or integrating a calculator feature into web projects.

Built with React, it offers a sleek UI and essential functionalities for basic calculations. Ideal for learning React basics or integrating a calculator feature into web projects.
